thread.title: BRIEF-Gray Television Reports Q4 Earnings Of $2.13 Per Share

title: BRIEF-Gray Television Reports Q4 Earnings Of $2.13 Per Share
text: 19 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Gray Television Reports Q4 Earnings Of $2.13 Per Share Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Gray Television Inc: * GRAY REPORTS RECORD OPERATING RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.13 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 15 PERCENT TO $233.6 MILLION * RECORDED A TAX BENEFIT OF $134.4 MILLION IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2017 * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $233.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q1 REVENUE (LESS AGENCY COMMISSIONS) $223 MILLION TO $228 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $233.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
